description.displayText: Ingrid worked for us four years ago when our long-time nanny was out on medical leave for six months.  I was VERY pleased with her.  She is a true professional and got the rhythm of our family in no time.  She checks all the boxes - she's a great employee and really great with my kids!  The first time we worked with Ingrid my daughters were 3 and 2 years old - she easily handled two toddlers on a full time basis. Then last year Ingrid came back from a year abroad and the timing was SO lucky for me as my nanny needed to take another medical leave.  I was so fortunate that she could just slip right back into our lives, while our nanny recovered.

description.displayText:
It is with full confidence that I can recommend Ingrid, our previous nanny, as a new addition to any family. Ingrid was able to step in when our original nanny had to abruptly leave due to medical reasons. Desperate, but still unwilling to hire just anybody, I interviewed Ingrid and was immediately put at ease.
 
Ingrid is kind, patient, loving, and fell into our routine without any issue. I'm pretty nuts about my daughter's nap schedule (who at the time was six months old), and Ingrid followed my instructions perfectly. She sang to my daughter, read her books, and took her out and about the neighborhood often. I was never worried or anxious about my daughter's well-being. Ingrid was never on her phone with my daughter and would give her complete attention. She was always on time and never took a sick day. Ingrid arrived for the day with cheer and would go straight to the baby with her arms wide open.
 
If it weren't for us moving out of state, we would've kept her on!

description.displayText: Ingrid is a wonderful nanny. She is highly dependable and trustworthy.  She is great with babies and kids. Very interactive and engaged. We still use her for occasional night babysitting. Our now almost 8 year old loves her.

description.displayText: Ingrid is an amazing nanny. She helped us raise our 3 daughters with respect and kindness in a loving environment. She will always be a part of our family and our go to person whenever we need childcare.. highly recommended by us!!
